abstract:
Kieron Wood interviewed and quoted Seth Barrett Tillman for The Sunday Business Post's 'Business of Law' column. Wood's column ran on July 14, 2013, an it was titled: "Open Democracy Requires Free Media Access to Court Documents".
This articles was also cross-posted on Nexis.
[December 8, 2013]
title: Interviewed by Kieron Wood for the
subject: law
